variable.comment: X size of the template script
variable.name: templateScriptSizeX

variable.comment: Y size of the template script
variable.name: templateScriptSizeY

variable.comment: Z size of the template script
variable.name: templateScriptSizeZ

variable.comment: Stores template script while editing to make readable
variable.name: readableTemplateScript

event-group.description: Functions to read the template script and calculate the x, y and z size of it.
event-group.title: Get Template Script Size

event-group.description: Functions related to converting the template script to a readable string, used to put it into the template array.
event-group.title: Convert Template Script to Readable Functions

event-group.description: Functions related to managing the template array.
event-group.title: Manage Template Array

event-group.description: Functions related to interpreting the readable template script and placing it into the template array.
event-group.title: Interpret Readable Template Script

variable.comment: Current x position for loop going through readable script.
variable.name: currentX

variable.comment: Current y position for loop going through readable script.
variable.name: currentY

variable.comment: Current z position for loop going through readable script.
variable.name: currentZ

variable.comment: Current character in looping through readable script.
variable.name: currentChar

sub-events.comment: For some reason these variables are acting like they are static, so I'm resetting them below

event-group.description: Function for exporting the template array to a template script.
event-group.title: Exporting Template Array

event-group.description: Function for rendering the template array.
event-group.title: Block Rendering

event-group.description: Function for looking through the template array for types of blocks.
event-group.title: Block Type Scanning

sub-events.comment: When using a delimiter like in 'tokenat', the delimiter itself is not part of the token. For example in the above, the string will not have = in either token 0 or 1.

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hover over a block to identify it..."
